definition: (prefix indicating ordinal number, e.g. first, number two etc)/order/(old) rank in the imperial examinations/mansion/(literary) but/just

sentences.english: American prefer buying Japs car and third world consumer goods.
sentences.chinese: 日本人喜欢买美国车和第三世界的消费品。

sentences.english: There is no conflict of fundamental interests among third world countries.
sentences.chinese: 第三世界国家之间没有根本的利害冲突。

sentences.english: The salient feature of the third world was that it wanted economic and political clout.
sentences.chinese: 第三世界的突出特点便是希望拥有政治和经济影响力。

sentences.english: Ninety percent of the immigrants to this city are from the Third World.
sentences.chinese: 洛杉矶市90%的移民来自第三世界。

sentences.english: Our foreign policy tilts toward the third world.
sentences.chinese: 我们的外交政策倾向于第三世界。

sentences.english: Yet as the razor wire suggests, the Third World lurks around many corners.
sentences.chinese: 这些刀片刺网暗示着第三世界潜伏在各个角落。

sentences.english: The Chinese people and other people of the third world are bound up by common interests and share weal and woe.
sentences.chinese: 中国人民和第三世界国家人民休戚相关，利害与共。

sentences.english: China belongs to the third world country.
sentences.chinese: 中国属于第三世界国家。

sentences.english: There is no conflict of fundamental interests among the third world countries.
sentences.chinese: 第三世界国家之间没有根本的利害冲突。

sentences.english: Poor health is the major transmission cause for most illnesses that affect Third World citisens.
sentences.chinese: 在第三世界，差的医疗是传染疾病的最主要途径。

sentences.english: As one of the great powers of developing countries of the Third World, Brazil is very active.
sentences.chinese: 巴西，作为第三世界发展中大国之一更是不甘落后。

sentences.english: Spend your vacation in a third world country helping impoverished people.
sentences.chinese: 利用假期到第三世界国家去帮助那里的人们。

sentences.english: We are very pleased that Third World countries have put forward the question of South-South cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 我们很高兴第三世界的国家提出南南合作问题。

sentences.english: They accused the West of dumping out-of-date medicines on Third World countries.
sentences.chinese: 他们谴责西方向第三世界倾销过期的药品。

sentences.english: When do we become a Third World nation?
sentences.chinese: 我们何时会沦为第三世界国家？

sentences.english: Trends of Trust Industry in Developed Countries(or Region) and the Inspi ration to Our Country;
sentences.chinese: 亚非拉和其他地区的发展中国家构成第三世界。

definition: Africa/abbr. for 阿非利加洲[A1 fei1 li4 jia1 Zhou1]
Latin America/abbr. for 拉丁美洲
